markdownRemark.excerpt: (images/amul22.gif) I love my Mumbai and the people. They came and they fought back and they helped other people. I spent four years in IIT-Bombay, but evenâ€¦
markdownRemark.html:
I love my Mumbai and the people. They came and they fought back and they helped other people. I spent four years in IIT-Bombay, but even after living away I realised, you can never take the Mumbai out of a man.
